definition.value: Success: You have successfully saved your settings!
Native ( sendmail binary and options "sendmail_path" setting of php.ini)
Mailer combines a DSN from config.php file. Please read our documentation for details

Store URL:
Include the full URL to your store. Make sure to add '/' at the end. Example: http://www.yourdomain.com/path/

Additional Alert E-Mails:
Any additional emails you want to receive the alert email, in addition to the main store email. (comma separated)
Alert E-Mails must be valid and comma-separated!

Title:
This is displayed in storefront browser title

Meta Tag Description:
Storefront main page meta tag description

Meta Keywords:
Storefront main page meta tag keywords (comma separated)
Template:Storefront template. This can be main or extension template
Administration Language: NOTE: works if no user preferred language is found in the browser

Base Currency:This is a base currency for all stores. Do not change if you do not understand what will happen. Warning: Changing of base currency will not change your base prices for products. You will need to review and adjust all the prices if needed. Base currency exchange rate will be set to 1.00 and all other currencies exchange rates will be adjusted in respect to new base currency.

Auto Update Currency:
Set your store to automatically update currencies daily.

Autotranslate Status:
This enabled translation of missing text definitions or language specific data if text values are missing for used language.

Source language for translation:
Select source language to be used for autotranslation.

Text Translation Method:
Select method you want to use for translation. Default method is a straight copy of source language text

Override if source language text was changed:
If set, text in all languages will be replaced with new translation if source language text is edited. NOTE: Can cause many translations.

Warn for missing language text:
Get warning message if missing language text is detected.

Invoice Start No.:
Set the starting number the invoices will begin from.

Invoice Prefix:
Set the invoice prefix e.g. IN/001

Login Display Prices:
Show prices even if customer is not logged in.

Approve New Customers:
Don't allow new customer to login until their account has been approved.

Require Login Name:
To improve security, require customers to create unique login name instead of using email address as login name. If set to ON, existing customers will be asked to create new login name at the first login. If OFF, login name is set as customer email address.

Guest Checkout:
Allow customers to checkout without creating an account. This will not be available when a downloadable product is in the shopping cart.

Account Terms:
Forces people to agree to terms before an account can be created.

Checkout Terms:
Forces people to agree to terms before an a customer can checkout.

Order Status:
Set the default order status when an order is processed.
Allow Customer to Cancel Order on Status:

Display Stock Quantity:
Display stock quantity on the product page.

No Stock Auto Disable:
Disable your product or option value for view if stock drops to 0. Message notification will be send

Default Stock Checkout:
Set default setting to allow customers checkout even if the products are out of stock

Default Pre-Order Stock Status:
Default setting for Pre-order status message for product. Used on product edit page.

Icon:
The icon can be a PNG or ICON type that is 16px x 16px.

Product List Height:
This is to control height of a preview image in the listing pages of admin and other places in the storefront. Note, this setting is shared between admin and default storefront template.

Product List Width:
This is to control width of a preview image in the listing pages of admin and other places in the storefront. Note, this setting is shared between admin and default storefront template.

Grid Image Width:
This is to control width of a very small preview image in the listing grids of admin and other places in the storefront. Note, this setting is shared between admin and default storefront template.

Grid Image Height:
This is to control height of a very small preview image in the listing grids of admin and other places in the storefront. Note, this setting is shared between admin and default storefront template.

Alert Mail:
Send a email to the store owner when a new order is created.

Download Order Status:
Set the order status the customers order must reach before they are allowed to access their downloadable products.
Mailer uses the sendmail binary and options configured in the sendmail_path setting of php.ini.

SMTP Host:
Use ssl://smtp.yourdomain.com for secure smtp connection

Use SSL:
To use SSL check with your host if a SSL certificate is installed.

Control Panel Session Expiration:
This value controls time interval in minutes before you will be asked to login again due to no activity.

Encryption Key:
Setting migrated to config file starting in v1.2.1.

Use SEO URL's:
To use SEO URL's apache module mod-rewrite must be installed and you need to rename the htaccess.txt to .htaccess. Note: If abantecart not installed in the root of domain must be changed rewriteBase rule inside .htaccess file.

Generate high-res (retina) images:
To use this apache module mod-rewrite must be installed and you need to rename the htaccess.txt to .htaccess. Note: If abantecart not installed in the root of domain must be changed rewriteBase rule inside .htaccess file.
After enabling should clear the cache images.

Output Compression Level:
GZIP for more efficient transfer to requesting clients. Compression level must be between 0 - 9

Display Errors:
Set to yes if you want to see the exceptions and errors

Log Errors:
Set to yes if you want to save the exceptions and errors to the log

Cache enabled:
Please be careful when disable caching. Cached pages will not be re-created and site might start loading slow.
Currently using cache %s driver. Other drivers available for configuration are %s

Storefront API Key:
Set this key to provide restricted (more secure) access to storefront API.

Storefront API Stock Access:
Enable if you allow storefront API to check stock availability

Admin API Key:
Set this key to provide restricted (more secure) access to admin API.

Admin API Access IPs:
Provide list of IPs (comma separated) that will be allowed to access admin API. Other IPs will be blocked
Resource Library Upload Max File Size, kB

Show Debug Info:
Set this ON if you want to see the execution details and show debug details.

Debug Level:
Select the depth of the details you need to see in the debug output.
Level 0 - no logs , only exception errors
Level 2 - #1 + mysql site load, php file execution time and page elements load time
Level 3 - #2 + basic logs and stack of execution

Template debug:
Enable this setting if you need to check issues with template in storefront and control panel.

Error Log Filename:
This is a file where errors are saved.

Use Shipping Session:
Saves shipping quotes to session to avoid re-quoting unnecessarily. Quotes will only be re-quoted if cart or address is changed.

Default Items per Page (Storefront):
Sets how many storefront items are shown per page (products, categories, etc)

Default Items per Page (Admin):
Sets how many admin items are shown per page in listing grids (orders, customers, etc)
Number of Items In Bestseller Block
Number of Items In Featured Block
Number of Items In Latest Block
Number of Items In Special Block

Display Weight on Cart Page:
Show the cart weight on the cart page

Post Reviews:
Restrict who can post review for the products

Maintenance Mode:
Prevents customers from browsing your store. They will instead see a maintenance message. If logged in as admin, you will see the store as normal.

Voice Control:
Enable admin voice control to activate voice commands feature. Currently only supported in Chrome version 25 or later.

Help Links:
If you want to see Help Icons and links to AbanteCart site. This will help you learn about features and how to use them. If you advanced user and do not want to see these help icons, you can disable.

Enable Tree Grid:
Enables admin grids to show parent/children types in one grid listing. NOTE: Pagination and multi-actions are disabled for these grids

Same Page Add To Cart:
This will enable AJAX add to cart feature. Product can be added to cart without redirecting to cart page

Maximum order amount allowed:
Prevent checkout with large order sub-total amounts. 0 = NO LIMIT

Minimum order amount:
Prevent checkout if order sub-total does not reach minimum amount set. 0 = NO MINIMUM

System Check:
Enable this setting if you want to check your system condition in respect to AbanteCart functionality. System issues effecting AbanteCart will be reported as messages visible in admin.
Warning: You do not have permission to modify settings!
Login name must be alphanumeric only and between 5 and 64 characters!
This login name is not available. Try different login name!
Store Name must be between 2 and 32 characters!
Title must be between 2 and 32 characters!
Store Owner must be between 2 and 64 characters!
Store Address must be between 10 and 256 characters!
E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!
Telephone must be between 2 and 32 characters!
Product Image Thumb Size dimensions required!
Product Image Popup Size dimensions required!
Brand Icon List Size dimensions required!
Additional Product Image Size dimensions required!
Related Product Image Size dimensions required!
Required Data has not been entered. Check for field errors!
Uploaded file %s is not image or broken!
Please fill required fields for smtp-protocol!

Show Zero Customer Balance:
Note: Enable/disable display of balance message if customer account balance is 0

Shipping and Tax Estimate:
Allow customers to get quick shipping and tax estimate in the shopping cart.

Coupon on shopping cart page:
Allow customers to enter coupon code and see discount in the shopping cart.

Google Analytics 4 tag ID:
Add your Google Analytics tag ID to enable site activity tracking. This also enables ecommerce activity tracking. You must enable ecommerce tracking in google on the profile settings page for your website

Google API Key (to enable google maps):
You can see address on the map. To enable google maps add your Google maps API key Google Credentials Page.

Secure Store URL:
Include the full SSL URL(HTTPS) to your store. Make sure to add '/' at the end. Example: https://www.yourdomain.com/path/

Email Activation for New Customers:
Don't allow new customer to login until their account has been confirmed by activation link sent via email. For this to work, make sure "Approve New Customers" is set to OFF.
Clone Template With AbanteCart Developer Tools
Set this template for the storefront
Open new page in new tab
Open new page in same window

Captcha on create account form :
Prevent spam/robot account creation with enabling human verification captcha

Google reCAPTCHA Site Key:
Add Google reCAPTCHA v2 to help your visitors with better captcha entry. If you enable reCAPTCHA site/secret keys, Google reCAPTCHA v2 will be activated instead of default AbanteCart captcha image

Google reCAPTCHA Secret Key:
Add Google reCAPTCHA v2 to help your visitors with better captcha entry. If you enable reCAPTCHA site/secret keys, Google reCAPTCHA v2 will be activated instead of default AbanteCart captcha image
This value can not exceed your php.ini directive %s (<=%s)

Order Start No.:
Set the starting number the orders will begin from.
Order start number must be a numeric!
Invoice start number must be a numeric!

Incomplete Order Expiration:
This value controls time interval in days before incomplete orders will be deleted. Empty value means that no orders will be to deleted.
Incomplete Order Expiration value must be a numeric!
Select an extension for SMS service provider
These settings are for instant messages sent automatically during AbanteCart events in storefront and admin.

Tasks API Key:
This is a secret key to allow AbanteCart to run scheduled processes from the browser with /task.php file. If not set, tasks will not run via browser.
NOTE: This API Key is not required for running tasks command line.

Default Tax Class:
Default value will be taken as default value for tax class of new creating product.

Color of fill for image resize
Color that will be filled into empty areas during image resizing from rectangle into square
To maintain correct platform functionality in all browsers and maintain data security, HTTPS protocol is required. All requests should be sent to HTTPS
Crontab in Linux command Run command crontab -e with the same Linux user running a web server for the AbanteCart. In the editor add the command

Allow coupon entry
Enable coupon entry by customers and guests
Require Payment Address Be the same as Shipping Address

Require Phone Number
Require phone number entry by customer or guest specific to the order

Guest Checkout Create Account
Offer the guest to create an account at the end of the checkout. This is transparent to guests and email will be sent with the login details.

Show order comment field
Comment textarea will be shown during checkout process
